note:
Sharks are cool and comfortable!

You may know me from Sandwich, ex-Twitter/Cohost (same username), or Twitch (as Sharkaeopteryx).

I don't follow-for-follow people I don't interact with. Don't EVER put me in a FollowFriday-type post.

I am perhaps >90% boosts, set your settings accordingly. No need to thank me for boosting a post.

US-born Vietnamese cis woman. Pronouns she/her (or just my name if we've never interacted).
